name: Out of Your Mind (itch) (JonnyLaw)
description:
This is a test of the game engine i have made so far. I added a maze generator to the game just for testing purposes. The plan is to turn this game into a RPG game using a rayCasting engine.

hidden controls - 

while in the maze, press N to turn off the collision detection.

while in the maze, at the pause menu, press all 4 of the fallowing keys at once (K U F C) - this will re-open the game with the map editor as well. make sure to load into the maze before using the editor
